name: The Orb of Èitmer
description:
A dungeon crawler. That is, you are crawling around in a dungeon. This means you can't easily turn around in tight spaces and your vision to where you came from is limited.

Find the Orb of Èitmer hidden within the dungeon, and beware the slimes for it is up to chance whether you or they will prevail should you meet. It is however better to face them head-on than to suffer an attack from behind.

If you find yourself stuck in a corner, try moving diagonally backwards.

 i
jkl - movement up, left, down, right

u o
m . - movement upleft, downleft, downright, upright

a - autoexplore

space - do nothing for a turn
r - restart
q - quit
c - configure keybindings
